message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%,  but remember, with each round, the value will decrease for both of us.
I'll give you a slightly better offer. You can have 30% and I'll take 70%. Let's make a deal.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still need a good share. 55% for me, 45% for you.  It's a fairer split, and we can end this before the money loses more value.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. 50/50 split. Let's end this before things get worse.
